name: Richard Earll
coverLetter:
I have some marijuana cultivation experience and about 2 years trimming experience. I have worked on 2 different farms in defoliation, wet trimming, and dry trimming. I currently work with a staffing agency in Oregon; I trim on average 60+ grams per hour.
I am a dedicated problem solver who approaches challenges with curiosity, imagination, depth of knowledge, integrity, and persistence, and help others to do the same. I am a meticulous worker with an eye for detail, a commitment to high quality, and a strong ability to analyze abstract problems, disclose obscure issues, and find solutions. I am a loyal team player in structured settings with shared objectives and clearly defined roles, who can also work independently and is highly motivated to learn technologies as required.
I am available to start immediately.
